description.narrative: Mercy Corps proposes to implement the program Impact Through Technology 2 to bring together Palestinian and Israeli youth, entrepreneurs, and private sector ICT companies around a shared interest in ICT. The program will use ICT as a mechanism to promote peaceful change as well as economic collaboration and growth. The program seeks to promote peace activism through the enhanced use of social media to build the capacity of Palestinian youth in collaboration with Israeli companies and joint Palestinian/ Israeli youth ICT activities; additionally, it will foster economic cooperation between Israelis and Palestinians in the ICT sector. This will be achieved through a series of integrated trainings, Business to Business meetings, networking events, and entrepreneurial events, all of which aim to develop the skills of Palestinian youth in ICT to capitalize on opportunities the project facilitates.

• Palestinian & Israeli youth and peace activist groups will collaborate through social media to promote a common agenda for peace, which will enable them to elevate their influence both in Israel and in Palestine as advocates for realistic stability. • Palestinian youth will benefit from meaningful employment opportunities and, as a result, will be less likely to engage in risky behavior as a way of addressing grievances. • Israeli and Palestinian entrepreneurs and private sector entities will collaborate in the ICT sector. Through such activities, they will realize tangible benefits to cooperation, have a common incentive to protect these benefits, and serve as positive role models for a younger generation of men and women looking for alternatives to violence.
